caption.p: Deterioration chart of different carbon based PSC devices ( a) EC-GC4 in Device-1 a ( b) EC-GC8 in Device-1 b ( c) EC-GC10 in Device-1 c ( d) C/NiS in Device-1 d ( e) CC in Device-1 e ( f) Comparative stability study of all the PSCs fabricated using different carbon based HTMs (EC-GC4, EC-GC8, EG-GC10, C/NiS and CC carbon) and tested for 1000 hours under ambient room condition (25 ± 5 °C, 70 ± 5% humidity).
